Reviews.Author: Douglas
Reviews.Content: I'm told  20-25 minute  wait for my prescription pickup.  1 hour and 40 minutes later and I'm still standing here waiting. I will now be a CVS customer.

Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: The woman at the cosmetics counter (I believe her name was Edith) was the most helpful person I've ever encountered at any Walgreens in both Vegas and Chicago. She helped me find the perfect lipstick shade and on top of that she busted out all these coupons that saved me 10 dollars! It payed for 1/4 of my purchase! I was so happy! That is now my favorite Walgreens to get cosmetics!

Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: (I'm reviewing the Take Care Clinic) The most efficient, effective way of getting your doctors note for work. The service was great, and the best part is that its all done in one room. The doctor never leaves the room for you to wait around! Super fast, great experience...i will use them again for sure

Reviews.Author: Dianna
Reviews.Content: Holy Crap! I came here because I needed to get some hair spray, thinking I'd forgotten it at home. When I asked for the travel size, the clerk showed me that I should buy the full size since the travel size was only $0.20 cheaper. (the hell you say?)  A six pack of Daisani was $3.49. Prices were astronomical, and outside the main door it seemed to be 4:20 every moment of the day.  The store was clean, well kept and over all, your typical Walgreens, only.. ON THE STRIP.

Reviews.Author: Erik
Reviews.Content: Worst Pharmacy EVER!!!  The women who work there are horrible bitc%es that have crappy attitudes.  They could care less about taking care of their customers.  They wouldn't fill my prescription and wouldn't give me a reason why.  Go to CVS

Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: A great pharmacy! The folks were super helpful when we forgot some meds at home. Then Jessica put in a coupon that saved is big $. Definitely recommended!

Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The customer service at this Walgreen's is phenomenal.  I tend to do my drug store shopping at... interesting hours... because it happens to be open 24 hours.  I came in, browsed for the items I needed and then went to the checkout pay.  I was warmly welcomed, quickly scanned, and then - they stopped - rummaged behind the counter and said  oh there's a coupon for this today, every little bit helps!   Wow really? How awesome is that.  This place is great!  I don't know if that is a policy or not but hey - customer service is all about creating raving fans - and congratulations - this Walgreen's made one today.  Keep it up!

Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Grace at Photo was awesome! Great customer service! Also the photo department offered many options for prints compared to CVS. Thank you Grace! :)

Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: This location is always clean and well stocked. Everyone at the pharmacy and Take Care Clinic are cool and helpful.  I've been to some stores closer to the strip that tend to get a  party crowd  coming in to pick up their supplies for the night or vagrants looking for handouts. That's never been a problem at this location.

Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: I'm writing this while waiting at the Walgreens clinic...I've never been to one before and this will be my last visit.  They seem disorganized; although I have an appointment, there are a number of patients in front of me, and I'm waiting 50 minutes and counting.  There is no receptionist on duty; it is run by a computer check-in system, and the PE on duty just runs around from room to room, barely keeping it together (she seems at least friendly). The clinic has a similar vibe to the photo development area, sort of a modular add-on with a cardboard laminate front desk.  Buyer beware.

Reviews.Author: Candace
Reviews.Content: Today I had to visit the Take Care Clinic insider here and I was truly grateful for their services. The MD on staff took me right in- no forms, no fuss. Straight to the  care .  They had a 6 minute strep test that she did right away.  Amazing.  No  sending it to the lab  and waiting.  Instant service. She also verified my insurance on the spot as well as electronically sent my prescription to the pharmacy...saving me a step. Great service and great idea.

Reviews.Author: Channele
Reviews.Content: This Walgreens location is 24 hours, by my house, and is in the parking lot of my favorite egg foo young spot (Chopstix).  Win!  It is always very clean in this store, and I always feel safe in it even late at night.  Every employee I have interacted with at this store is pleasant, and for the most part it does not take too long to get in and get out.  Like most Walgreens, they have a seasonal area with all the goodies for upcoming holidays/seasons.  I love checking out the clearance here as well as in the back corner.  I've scored many a candy and nail polish for dirt cheap.  Even when I'm deathly ill and trying to get some Sudafed from the pharmacy, they don't give me any funny looks and quickly check me out with a smile.  I suppose they're used to seeing sickies back there, though.  Ha.  Ah, Sin City.  The town where 24-hour convenience is in abundance.  I'm pretty sure we're spoiled here.

Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I wish I could give this place zero stars.  I would if I could.  At 2pm, I asked the pharmacy tech on duty to transfer a prescription from CVS.  I intended to transfer all of my prescriptions here.  I was told my prescription for Tikosyn would be ready in an hour.  At 3pm, I was first told that CVS forgot to fax the prescription to them.  I said I would go to CVS, and get it.I was then quickly  told the pharmacist who just left forgot.  When I asked what her name was, the pharmacy tech refused to tell me, and the pharmacist on duty said she didn't know because she didn't look at the board. I was then told it would be another hour.  At 4pm, I returned, only to be told they do not have any Tikosyn in stock.  (Pfizer, the drug company, told me Walgreens ALWAYS has it in stock.  I called, and let them know it was not true at this location.)  I was then directed to the Walgreen at Warm Springs, and Arroyo Grande by the pharmacist at Windmill and Eastern, who told me she would fax the order to them.  She called them in front of me, and told me it will be ready for pickup.  At 4:15, I arrived, only to be told nothing was faxed yet, and to return in an hour.  At 5:45, I called, only to be told that the pharmacist at Windmill and Eastern STILL hadn't faxed anything to her.  At 6:30, I finally had the medicine in my possession.  I tried to give Walgreens all of my business. This is the definition of failure, and the reason I will NEVER be a Walgreens customer again.

Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Pretty much your average Walgreens.  No complaints.  Their ATM machine works great each time I've used it.

Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: I've always had good experiences at this Walgreens, from the weekly stop to pick up Aquafina, Coke, or STRAWBERRY SOUR STRAWS (yes, I'm yelling, caps totally necessary).   The pharmacy staff is always helpful and don't seem to be the type that would make fun of you behind your back if you got an embarrassing prescription.  The rest of the staff is also non-judgmental it seems even when I walk in with an old out of style t-shirt that's 3 times too large for me and a pair of atrocious jeans or whatever not to be seen in public outfit I might be wearing when there's an emergency and I need to get replacement smoke detector batteries before the beeping makes me stab my eardrums with a screwdriver.  The only reason I'm doing 4 and not 5 is because typical of all Walgreens, not just this location, the prices are a little higher on most items than your standard grocery store.  But I usually pay the difference because the closest grocery store is approximately .0000000003 miles farther from my house and I'm too lazy to go the extra distance.

Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: This is the location you will find on the southwest corner of Windmill and Eastern.   I love the fact that this location is open 24 hours a day! As someone who works graves, I can appreciate all the places that are open overnight, so that I can get some errands done on my off days while still maintaining my schedule! (Same goes with the gym, Walmart, laundromat, etc.)  I usually come here to fill my scripts as well. They have an outstanding Walgreens Prescription Savings Club that will give you substantial discounts on your meds whether you have insurance or not! It only costs $20..00 a year too! Screaming deal! I saved almost $1,200 last year alone with this plan!   Otherwise, the store is very clean and well stocked. Every employee I have talked to has been helpful and friendly.   I really like this Walgreens location.  4 stars!

Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: If anything I love the csi looking cast in the pharmacy. Enhance enhance enhance.   Dive through is fast just watch out for the intersection coming out. Parking lot needs some stop signs. Hell it's vegas every where needs them.   The photo center has some great staff that can point out how to get the best deals. Made a photo book for my parents and it came out fairly decent
